alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued May 04 at 2:24AM MDT until May 04 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...South Laramie Range, South Laramie Range Foothills, Central Laramie County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility overnight through this morning. Visibilities may lower to one tenth of a mile or less at times.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
